base_desc_mp3: Extracts audio from a video message and sends it back as an audio file (MP3).
base_tags_mp3: audio, mp3, extract, video, convert, sound, voice
base_help_mp3: 🎧 Audio Extract Command /audio or /mp3 Extracts the audio track from any video and sends it back as an MP3 file. ✅ Features: • Works with video messages, replies. • Automatically extracts and converts to MP3. • Keeps high-quality sound.
base_examples_mp3:
• Reply to a video → /mp3
• Send video with caption → /audio
